column5: Local Brook Trout guru and friend Gord Ellis posted this on his fb page today, and with his permission... Well, I'll let the picture do the talking.
Wow...  What were the Measurements on that? Thats a dam impressive fish!
A Nipigon brookie on a Nipigon spoon...NICE!
They are an incredibly beautiful fish, whether their 9 inches or a tank like that one
Now that's a squaretail!  What a beauty.
Gord has a knack for those
Wow that thing is a beast!!!!
Wow, the girth on that beast is astonishing. A trophy like this beauty is hands down the holy grail of trout.
Thanks for sharing.  May we all catch and release one like that someday!
Wow that's a beauty!!  I predict a shortage of those Nipigon spoons in the near future..  cheers HD
